companyInfo.title: TRANS OFFER
companyInfo.description: The logistics company 'TRANS OFFER' was founded in 2018. For 8 years we have been working in this field and transporting oversized cargo across Russia and CIS countries. We have everything necessary for this responsible and complex work. Our main goals are timely delivery of cargo from point A to point B while maintaining the quality and integrity of the transported goods. Quality, punctuality and responsibility are our key skills.

items: Freight forwarding. End-to-end shipment management from loading to final delivery
Terminal hubs. Cross-docking and cargo consolidation at modern logistics facilities
Gauge integration. Seamless transit via combined use of 1520 mm and 1435 mm railway networks
Multimodal transport. Flexible routing and end-to-end clearance
